References

   
Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Classes/Engine/StreamableRenderAsset.h
Include #include "Engine/StreamableRenderAsset.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Abstract, MinimalAPI)  
class UStreamableRenderAsset : public UObject

Variables

  Type Name Description
uint8: 1 bForceMiplevelsToBeResident Override whether to fully stream even if texture hasn't been rendered.
uint8: 1 bGlobalForceMipLevelsToBeResident Global and serialized version of ForceMiplevelsToBeResident.
uint8: 1 bHasStreamingUpdatePending Whether some mips might be streamed soon.
uint8: 1 bIgnoreStreamingMipBias When forced fully resident, ignores the streaming mip bias used to accommodate memory constraints.
uint8: 1 bUseCinematicMipLevels Whether to use the extra cinematic quality mip-levels, when we're forcing mip-levels to be resident.
FStreamableRenderResourceState CachedSRRState Gamethread coherent state of the resource.
double ForceMipLevelsToBeResidentTimestamp WorldSettings timestamp that tells the streamer to force all miplevels to be resident up until that time.
TArray< FLODStreamingCallbackPayload > MipChangeCallbacks  
uint8: 1 NeverStream  
FPerQualityLevelInt NoRefStreamingLODBias  
int32 NumCinematicMipLevels Number of mip-levels to use for cinematic quality.
TRefCountPtr< class FRenderAssetUpdate > PendingUpdate An update structure used to handle streaming strategy.
int32 StreamingIndex FStreamingRenderAsset index used by the texture streaming system.
